Table.tableName: Survival and time to progression in resected and non-resected patients
Table.tableFooter: CI=confidence interval; DF, disease-free; NR=not reached; OS=overall survival; TTP=time to progression.

Document.DocumentTitle: Final analysis of colorectal cancer patients treated with irinotecan and 5-fluorouracil plus folinic acid neoadjuvant chemotherapy for unresectable liver metastases
